WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. UNDERWATER OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL
   24 JAN 22 BY M/V SILENCIO VI IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-49.82S 040-50.13W, 21-49.83S 040-51.33W,
   21-47.50S 040-59.28W, 21-47.85S 040-58.27W,
   21-49.70S 040-58.50W, 21-50.55S 040-48.70W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 25 JAN 22.
